name: Rolly Bally - free - 2d -platformer - android - ios - windows
name_original: Rolly Bally - free - 2d -platformer - android - ios - windows
description:
Best causal game of the year?

Can you beat your friends high score?!

Choose from over 20 unlock-able characters

Share your high score and compete with your friends

Which Rolly Bally will be your favorite?

Addictive fun game play.Endless runner meets flappy bird in a fun action packed fast passed game of luck & skill!

Clean graphics and fun music! Some even have super powers!

All developed and created by 1 man indie developer team!

More updates coming soon.

Whats coming next? improved graphics - more stages - more power ups - more characters

Leave a review of what you would like to see next in the update!
